sn35.157:0.3: 157. The Exterior and the End of Relishing
sn35.157:1.1: “Mendicants, sights really are impermanent. A mendicant sees that they are impermanent: that’s their right view.
sn35.157:1.3: When relishing ends, greed ends. When greed ends, relishing ends.
sn35.157:1.5: When relishing and greed end, the mind is said to be well freed.
sn35.157:1.10: Thoughts really are impermanent. A mendicant sees that they are impermanent: that’s their right view.
sn35.157:1.12: When relishing ends, greed ends. When greed ends, relishing ends.
sn35.157:1.14: When relishing and greed end, the mind is said to be well freed.”
